Text:
function ERI_EP04_15()
    --.転-1【12月第1週】「姫神ダリアの実力」
    SaveData.Title = "姫神ダリアの実力"

    --//BG：男子部教室（夜）
    FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    --//effect：セピア加工

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

    MSG([[ One afternoon after school in the boys' club room, there was a scene like this. I ended up sparring in judo techniques with Daria-san over something so trivial I’ve forgotten what started it. ]])

    --//BU：ダリア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0681.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Alright, Daria-san, I’ll go all out." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0228.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Of course, come at me with your best. This is a serious match after all." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",300,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG015ca")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",300,false)

    MSG([[ I grabbed Daria-san’s clothing and pulled my hips back quickly, trying to throw her body. ]])

    MSG([[ But—she didn’t budge an inch, like trying to move a deeply rooted giant tree. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0229.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "You’re relying too much on strength. Your training’s still lacking." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0682.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Whoa!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",300,false)

    MSG([[ I was easily knocked to the ground with a foot sweep. As someone confident in arrest techniques, I couldn’t hide my shock. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG015ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Daria-san apologized to me with a sorry look. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0230.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Do you know side-guard technique? It incorporates Aikido into arrest techniques to specialize more in self-defense. I’m a practitioner of it." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ib")
    DARIA_PARTICLE_02(150,0,0,100,500)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0231.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Since it’s based on the same style, I know counters to your moves too. It’s just a game, so don’t take it too hard." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ That day, I challenged Daria-san three times and got thrown to the floor all three times. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though she said it was just for fun, she showed no leniency at all. ]])

    MSG([[ I’d never lost at board games against Ouga-kun either, so I found it amusing at the time—maybe she’s surprisingly competitive. ]])

    MSG([[ And now— ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

    --//CG：武術の修行（構え）
    FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV022aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1133.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ughh!?!!" ]])
    --//SE：床に叩きつけられる音（ﾀﾞｧﾝｯ！）
PLAY_SE("SEc018.wav")
WAIT(200)

    --//BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030" , 300,false)

    --//effect：明滅
LAYER_LOAD(80,"BG000ab")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_LOAD(80,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",50,false)
LAYER_LOAD(80,"BG000ab")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(80,0,800,Ease.InCubic)
WAIT(800)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0315.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Kyaa!? Sister!?" ]])

    MSG([[ I was slammed hard onto the tatami on my back, my vision flashing. Enduring a choking tightness in my throat, I stood trembling on my feet and prepared again. ]])

    --//CG：武術の修行（構え）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV022aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1134.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "One more time, please." ]])

    MSG([[ The middle-aged man in a judogi opposite me ran his hand through his salt-and-pepper hair and readied himself. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("aikidoist_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aikido Practitioner】
 "I’m reluctant to throw a girl any more, but fine, come at me." ]])

    MSG([[ I was receiving Aikido lessons in the academy’s dojo on my days off to counter Daria-san’s throws. ]])

    MSG([[ The man training me is an Aikido instructor connected to Uran-san’s family. ]])

    MSG([[ If we’re to compete with 'martial arts' as the theme, I’d surely lose unless I understand the source of the “weight” I felt when grappling with Daria-san before. ]])

    MSG([[ I have to at least grasp the mechanics by practicing Aikido techniques. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1135.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "...Not yet, not yet." ]])

    MSG([[ Measuring distance cautiously with sliding steps, I edged closer little by little. The distance—closed in. ]])

    --//SE：組み合う音（ｶﾞｯ！）
PLAY_SE("SEc024.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"EV022ba")
    LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,110,110)
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,1100,-450)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask025",500,false)

    MSG([[ I suddenly closed the gap and grabbed the collar of the teacher’s judogi. He didn’t seem to respond to my move. This time, I’m sure I’ll throw him! ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1136.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Sei!!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask025",500,false)

    MSG([[ I swung my hips abruptly to attempt the throw. ]])

    MSG([[ But my hip movement stopped halfway. Like grappling a massive, immovable tree, not a twitch. It was a sensation close to what I felt wrestling Daria-san before. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"EV022aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("aikidoist_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aikido Practitioner】
 "You have a good knack for it. But you’re not used to initiating the attack yourself." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("aikidoist_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aikido Practitioner】
 "Therefore, against an unyielding opponent, you become very powerless." ]])

    --//SE：畳に叩きつけられる音（ﾀﾞｧﾝｯ！）
PLAY_SE("SEc018.wav")
WAIT(200)

    --//BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030" , 300,false)

    --//effect：明滅
LAYER_LOAD(80,"BG000ab")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_LOAD(80,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",50,false)
LAYER_LOAD(80,"BG000ab")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(80,0,800,Ease.InCubic)
WAIT(800)

    MSG([[ I thought he grabbed my arm, then pushed me lightly backward, throwing off my balance and slamming me chest-first onto the floor. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1137.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ugh!? Cough… cough…" ]])

    MSG([[ A suffocating grip as if my lungs were being grabbed. The pain of my body hitting the floor and the smell of tatami. It had all been a while. ]])
    --//CG：武術の修行（構え）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV022aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ But it’s alright. I’m used to this. It’s not hard at all. Seeing me stubbornly stand back up, the teacher frowned worriedly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("aikidoist_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aikido Practitioner】
 "Still going? Don’t overdo it or you’ll injure yourself." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1138.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "...Thank you for your concern, but I don’t have time to rest." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1139.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Seaaaaaah!!!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",500,false)

    --//SE：組み合う音（ｶﾞｯ！）
PLAY_SE("SEc024.wav")
WAIT(200)
    --//SE：床に叩きつけられる音（ﾀﾞｧﾝｯ！）
PLAY_SE("SEc018.wav")
WAIT(800)
    --//SE：組み合う音（ｶﾞｯ！）
PLAY_SE("SEc024.wav")
WAIT(500)
    --//SE：床に叩きつけられる音（ﾀﾞｧﾝｯ！）
PLAY_SE("SEc018.wav")
WAIT(1000)
    --//SE：組み合う音（ｶﾞｯ！）
PLAY_SE("SEc024.wav")
WAIT(800)
    --//SE：床に叩きつけられる音（ﾀﾞｧﾝｯ！）
PLAY_SE("SEc018.wav")
WAIT(600)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0506.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "E-Erika..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0333.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Erika-san..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0316.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Erika Onee-sama..." ]])

    MSG([[ With Lira-san and the others watching, no matter how many times I was thrown or slammed to the floor, I kept the sparring with the teacher going. ]])

    --//CG：武術の修行（構え・傷だらけ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV022ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1140.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Haa... haa... not yet, not yet..." ]])

    MSG([[ No matter how many times I tried, I never managed to land a throw on the teacher. ]])

    MSG([[ And then— ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)

    --//BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    --//SE：床に倒れる音（ﾄﾞｻｯ！）
PLAY_SE("SEc027.wav")
WAIT(400)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0507.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "E-Erika!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0334.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Erika-san!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0317.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Hyuuaaaaaaaaa!!?? Erika Onee-samaaaaaaa!!!?" ]])

    MSG([[ In the middle of practice, I suddenly lost consciousness.]])
    --　　　　◆
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP04_16")
end
